name: Build Your Way Out!
description:
This game was made in 3 days (well actually in 2 days since i restarted on day 2). The theme was "Build Your Way Out". This is my first game as well so feedback would be nice :D

I know that there are probaby more bugs in this game than unique features (technically not true because it's not a bug, it's a feature!) but the time is over which means i can't fix them anymore. I will (hopefully) remake this project entirely and add more levels, a story and maybe a brand new mechanic that i feel like would go along well with this game. 

I'm sorry for not getting the WebGL build to work. I tried it for over 1 hour and failed. However i made a Windows build and i will try to make MacOS/Linux builds if i can  figure out how to do that.
